fewdee.engine

The engine core. Provides some very fundamental services, plus some utilities.

License:
Zlib License.

Authors:
Leandro Motta Barros

enum Features;
A list of features that can be enabled when initializing the engine.

MOUSE
Enable generation of mouse events.

KEYBOARD
Enable generation of keyboard events.

JOYSTICK
Enable generation of joystick events.

NONE
Disable all supported features.

I_WANT_IT_ALL
Enable all supported features.

class Crank;
A handy way to start the engine. "Crank", "handy", "start an engine"... witty naming, uh? (Incidentally, FewDee's Crank also stops the engine.)

Notice that this is a , so it must be instantiated with the keyword.

See Also:


https:
//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crank_%28mechanism%29#20th_Century

this(Features features = Features.I_WANT_IT_ALL);
Creates the , which causes the engine to be started ( is called).

Parameters:
features = The desired engine features. By default, all features are enabled. If you know that, say keyboard events will not be used in your program, you can pass here and hope to spare a few microsseconds per frame.

class Engine;
The Engine singleton. Provides access to the one and only instance.
